description:
Job Description

As a Receptionist for our company, you will perform various administrative tasks, including answering phones, scheduling meetings, call-backs and data importing/exporting. For this role, a strong internet connection is required, along with experience using communication tools like Teams and CRM platforms such as Salesforce and high level of computer proficiency.

Ultimately, you should be able to handle administrative projects and work well with minimum supervision. Would need to be in office 1-2 days per week.

Previous receptionist or Administrative experience a plus.

Full time position, mostly remote, $18/hr to start.

No degree required
